00013   CaliceElogInfo::CaliceElogInfo( EVENT::LCCollection* col )
00014   {
00015 
00016     if (col->getNumberOfElements() != 1) {
00017       throw std::invalid_argument("CaliceElogInfo: this collection does not contain exactly one element");
00018     }
00019 
00020     EVENT::LCGenericObject *genericObject = dynamic_cast<EVENT::LCGenericObject*>(col->getElementAt(0));
00021     if (genericObject == NULL)
00022       throw std::invalid_argument("CaliceElogInfo: this LCObject is not an LCGenericObject");
00023 
00024     if (genericObject->getNInt() != kNInts
00025         || genericObject->getNFloat() != kNFloats)
00026       throw std::invalid_argument("CaliceElogInfo: suspicious number of elements in this LCGenericObject");
00027 
00028     setRunNumber(         genericObject->getIntVal(kRunNumber));
00029     setPdgType(           genericObject->getIntVal(kPdgType));
00030     setQualityFlag(       genericObject->getIntVal(kQualityFlag));
00031     setTriggerType(       genericObject->getIntVal(kTriggerType));
00032     setTriggerSetting(    genericObject->getIntVal(kTriggerSetting));
00033     setEnergy(            genericObject->getFloatVal(kEnergy));
00034     setCherenkovPressure( genericObject->getFloatVal(kCherenkovPressure) );
00035     setCherenkov2Pressure(genericObject->getFloatVal(kCherenkov2Pressure) );
00036     setPositionX(         genericObject->getFloatVal(kPositionX));
00037     setPositionY(         genericObject->getFloatVal(kPositionY));
00038     setRotationAngle(     genericObject->getFloatVal(kRotationAngle));
00039 
00040     _runType = col->getParameters().getStringVal("runType");
00041 
00042   }

00048                                  const int pdgType,

00053                                  const float cherenkovPressure,
00054                                  const float cherenkov2Pressure,
00055                                  const float positionX,
00056                                  const float positionY,
00057                                  const float rotationAngle)
00058   {

00209   const std::string CaliceElogInfo::getDataDescription() const
00210   {

00212       "i:triggerType,i:triggerSetting,"
00213       "f:energy,f:cherenkovPressure,f:cherenkov2Pressure,f:positionX,f:positionY,f:rotationAngle";

00245   /**************************************************************/
00246   EVENT::LCCollection *CaliceElogInfo::getCollection() const
00247   {
00248     EVENT::LCCollection *col = new IMPL::LCCollectionVec(EVENT::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00249 
00250     col->addElement(const_cast<CaliceElogInfo*>(this));
00251 
00252     EVENT::LCParameters &parameters = col->parameters();
00253     parameters.setValue("runType", _runType);
00254 
00255     return col;
00256   }
